definition: to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: You need be for balance and contrast, for prayer and inner peace
sentences.chinese: 你需我来趋于衡平，寻求对照，潜心祝祷，舒缓内心。

sentences.english: And then it stabilized and has remained at this level.
sentences.chinese: 然后趋于平稳，并一直维持在这一水平上。

sentences.english: After listening the Buddhist music, the pains and troubles disappear and the heart regains the equanimity.
sentences.chinese: 佛教音乐使人听闻之下烦恼顿消，内心趋于平静。

sentences.english: After the tillering stage the biomass 15N tended towards stable.
sentences.chinese: 在分蘖期以后微生物固持态15N的变化趋于稳定。

sentences.english: It is usually added that understanding must not go too far.
sentences.chinese: 再则，也常有人说，理智不可太趋于极端。

sentences.english: By late liberation war, the conditions for multi-party cooperation toward maturity.
sentences.chinese: 到了解放战争后期，多党合作的条件趋于成熟。

sentences.english: Is the vessel in any immediate danger of sinking or capsizing ?
sentences.chinese: 船是否有趋于沉没或倾覆的危险。
风险估值走低，事情趋于平衡。

sentences.english: Further income elasticities tend to be stable over time.
sentences.chinese: 久而久之，以后的收入弹性将趋于稳定。

sentences.english: In general, any region in the visual field tends to induce its complementary color in neighboring areas.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，任何视觉区域都会趋于临域的补色。

sentences.english: The environment and functions of Momoge wetland go worsen.
sentences.chinese: 可见莫莫格湿地的生态环境及功能趋于恶化。

sentences.english: As the government of the South Sung Dynasty stabilized, the bowmen were removed during the 4th year of Shaoxing.
sentences.chinese: 随著南宋政权趋于稳定，绍兴四年高宗罢废新置弓手。

sentences.english: The US financial markets are also stabilizing with positive signs in its economy.
sentences.chinese: 美国金融市场趋于稳定，经济运行出现一些积极迹象。

sentences.english: The volume condenses in the beginning, then dilates, and finally comes to the steady state.
sentences.chinese: 试体之体积先产生压缩，然后膨胀，最后亦趋于稳定。

sentences.english: The crisis trends toward a reconciliation.
It is shown that the proper acceleration of null geodesic with conjugate points approaches infinity.
sentences.chinese: 具有共轭点的类光测地线的固有加速度趋于无穷大。

definition: to become more and more/to gradually become
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
to approach (a numerical value)/to converge to a limit (in calculus)/convergence
to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
day by day/more and more/increasingly/more and more with each passing day
to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
